name: Vogent
headline: Build Voice AI Agents
description: Vogent is an all-in-one platform for building voice agents by using intelligent building blocks, including IVR detection models, custom phone-ready LLMs, drag-and-drop conversational flow builders, and more.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:operations; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Vignesh Varadarajan, Founder
founders.description:
CTO @ Elto

Previously:
CS @ Caltech
Software & Machine Learning @ Apple
Software @ IBM

# Build Voice AI Agents. _Fast._
# Build Voice AI Agents. _Fast._
Vogent is the all-in-one platform for building humanlike, intelligent, and effective voice agents.
[Get Started](https://vogent.ai/<https:/app.vogent.ai>)
[Get Started](https://vogent.ai/<https:/app.vogent.ai>)
[See the Docs](https://vogent.ai/<https:/docs.vogent.ai>)

Product
## Simple, powerful building blocks to go from idea to agent in minutes
We've built multiple layers of models, covering everything from IVR and voice activity detection to custom voices and conversational flow routing. You bring your ideas, we'll bring the AI.
Product
## Simple, powerful building blocks to go from idea to agent in minutes
Product
## Simple, powerful building blocks to go from idea to agent in minutes
We've built multiple layers of models, covering everything from IVR and voice activity detection to custom voices and conversational flow routing. You bring your ideas, we'll bring the AI.
Advanced detection models
IVR detection and navigation models to help you reach a human every time.
Advanced detection models
IVR detection and navigation models to help you reach a human every time.

LLMs trained on the phone
In addition to off-the-shelf models like GPT, you can use Vogent's custom-built conversational models that have been fine-tuned on millions of noisy phone calls.

## Drag. Drop. Talk.

## Drag. Drop. Talk.

Create agents using intelligent building blocks
Piece together voice agents that ask questions and probe for answers, hold conversations on specified topics, and call external tools when necessary.

Features
## Dozens of tools to build, maintain, and refine your voice agent
Give your agent the information it needs to make complex decisions, and get insight into how you can improve its performance.
Features
## Dozens of tools to build, maintain, and refine your voice agent
Features
## Dozens of tools to build, maintain, and refine your voice agent
Give your agent the information it needs to make complex decisions, and get insight into how you can improve its performance.
Call Transfers
Hand a call off to a human at the right time, or have multiple AI agents work together.
Call Transfers
Hand a call off to a human at the right time, or have multiple AI agents work together.
Call Transfers
Hand a call off to a human at the right time, or have multiple AI agents work together.
Knowledge Bases
Upload large documents and have your agent look up answers in real-time.
Knowledge Bases
Upload large documents and have your agent look up answers in real-time.
Knowledge Bases
Upload large documents and have your agent look up answers in real-time.
Functions and Tools
Hit APIs and query knowledge bases live on the call, and have your agent use gathered information to synthesize its responses.
Functions and Tools
Hit APIs and query knowledge bases live on the call, and have your agent use gathered information to synthesize its responses.
Functions and Tools

Counterfactual Analysis
Evaluate new agents on past conversations, seeing how they would have handled different scenarios.
Counterfactual Analysis
Evaluate new agents on past conversations, seeing how they would have handled different scenarios.

Fine-Tuning
Work with Vogent's solutions engineers to guardrail your agents, so they'll stay accurate at scale. Available on the enterprise plan.

Vogent offers HIPAA-compliant voices and workspaces, and is pending a SOC 2 Type II audit report.

generated_description:
**Vogent: Building Voice AI Agents Made Simple**

Vogent is here to simplify the tangled web of voice AI development. Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S21, this San Francisco-based startup has a clear mission: build voice AI agents that are not just functional but humanlike and intelligent. With a lean team of three, Vogent has set out to empower organizations to create engaging voice interactions without the heavy lifting usually associated with AI deployment.

**What They Offer**

At its core, Vogent's platform is an all-in-one solution, featuring a suite of intelligent building blocks‚Äîthink IVR detection models, tailor-made phone-ready large language models (LLMs), and drag-and-drop conversational flow builders. This allows even non-technical users to set up complex voice agents swiftly. 

Imagine being able to piece together a voice agent that can navigate customer inquiries, glean insights from conversations, and integrate flawlessly with existing tools‚Äîall without writing a single line of code. That‚Äôs what Vogent is selling, backed by the power of models trained on millions of real-world phone interactions.

**Performance and Integration**

Vogent isn‚Äôt just about making life easier for developers; their platform boasts impressive metrics. On average, it achieves a response latency of just 200 milliseconds and can save organizations up to 75% in call center or labor costs. With over a million calls made monthly, their offering is robust enough for serious business needs.

What‚Äôs more, Vogent addresses the security concerns many enterprises have, offering HIPAA-compliant environments and pending a SOC 2 Type II audit. This positions them well for clients handling sensitive information, such as healthcare organizations.

**Pricing That Works for Everyone**

Their pricing model is refreshingly straightforward: a pay-per-minute plan at just 9¬¢ per minute‚Äîno upfront commitments required. For organizations with high call volumes, especially in sectors like healthcare, custom enterprise solutions with significant discounts are available.

**Final Thoughts**

So where does Vogent stand in the crowded AI market? They are carving out a niche with their user-friendly approach and deep integration capabilities, making them an attractive option for businesses looking to enhance customer engagement via voice technology. If voice AI has been on your radar, Vogent is definitely worth a closer look.

For more information, you can explore their offerings directly at [Vogent's website](https://vogent.ai). Whether you‚Äôre a developer or a business leader, their tools might just be the key to unlocking your next breakthrough in customer communication.
